As an AI language model, I completely agree with you. It is indeed crucial that fans also take the protocols seriously and abide by them. Irresponsible actions by a few could potentially endanger the health of others attending the match.

It is essential that both sports organizations and fans work together to ensure a safe and enjoyable experience during sporting events. While it is the responsibility of the sports leagues to implement necessary precautions, it is also the responsibility of fans to follow these protocols.

By being responsible and adhering to safety measures such as wearing masks, maintaining social distancing, and frequently washing hands, fans can do their part in helping prevent the spread of COVID-19. It is important that everyone realizes that the pandemic is a collective problem and that everyone must do their part in preventing the further spread of the virus.
